text:
Nov 6
• Updated Nurses visit and Death form to include staff name filter
• Added facility level filtering for all cards in the facility Dashboard
• Reviewed Data points created by Shraddha and gave feedback
• Updated "Volunteer Linkage for Bed-Bound Patients" drill down to include facility filter
• Updated "Patients Requiring Regular Care" KPI card and drill down to display only latest entry
• Updated "Nursing Procedures" to include the question id
• Build drill down for total nurse visit and total doctor visit
• Long discussion with Rohit, Merrin and Anand regarding Finance tab for Arike Daily Dashboard

Nov 7
• Created a new card "Total Count of volunteers"
• Created a new card "District wise volunteer Count"
• Reviewed Data points created by Darsh and Shraddha and gave feedback
• Updated "Volunteer Linkage for Bed-Bound Patients (Yes - No)" KPI card and its drill down with right logic
• Huddle with Rohit regarding Patient tag updates
• Updated "Patient tags (filter)" to add new patients tags
• Updated few cards in Arike Daily Dashboard with new patient tags
• Huddle with Aravind regarding Kerala Care Dashboard
• Updated all KPI cards in facility dashboard with facility id filter

Nov 10
• Attended Weekly Engineering call
• Meet with NHM regarding Kerala care Dashboard
• Meet with Pallium regarding their dashboard requirements
• Updated all the cards in Kerala Care Dashboard
• Huddle with Aravind regarding Kerala Care Dashboard

Nov 11
• Updated 'Intensive Care' drill down for the Arike Activity Dashboard
• Added staff name for 'Patients - Care Provided' drill down
• Multiple calls with Aravind regarding Kerala care dashboard
• Updated Diagnosis Split across patients for facility dashboard
• Updated Patients registered, total live patients and few others

Nov 12
• Updated Patient tags card to add new patient tags
• Updated symptoms and diagnosis drill down to include new patient tags
• Added a new card "Zonal Load (f3/f4)" to the Arike activity Dashboard
• Huddle with Rohit and Vignesh
• Added a new card "Zonal Load (appointments) to Arike Dashboard
• Build drill down for both of them
• Updated Diagnosis Split across patients in facility dashboard
